Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which we believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and high-quality craftsmanship, we estimate its value to be well above the market average. Considering its exceptional capabilities and benefits, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $750000. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best possible value while also maximizing our earnings. We look forward to the opportunity to discuss how this product can contribute to your success. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $750,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $750,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
